title: On My Side
lyrics:
In the front lines, You fight for me
Oh Your kindness is my shield
When the armies rise, and I am scared
My heart You will defend
You are on my side

You go before me

You stand behind

You tell my fear to run

Always and forever

I am loved



You are on my side

You are on my side



In the tragedy, You grieve with me

Your comfort is my song

In my wandering, You're still rescuing

You will never, never give up



You are on my side

You go before me

You stand behind

You tell my fear to run

Always and forever

I am loved



You are on my side

You are on my side



You were on my side

You were on my side

When I couldn't see

When I couldn't feel

When the pain was real



You were on my side

You were on my side

When You saved me from

My heart of stone

You awoke these bones



You were on my side

You were on my side

Nothing on this earth

Could ever separate me

From Your love!



You are on my side

You go before me

You stand behind

You tell my fear to run

Always and forever

I am loved!

You are on my side

You go before me

You stand behind

You tell my fear to run

Always and forever

I am loved



You are on my side

You are on my side...
